message:
found this page from stackoverflow.com/questions/58760448/is-there-a-modern-equivalent-to-the-vb6-winsock-control-in-visual-studio-net

i try read doc about winsocket then what i found, he tell background worker is dead. We are in 2022 with upcoming .Net Core 7.0 on roadmap. Start learning .net from 2014. Thank You. Now i can leave in peace.
